name: Txt2Bmp Coder
short_description: Txt2Bmp is a console application for encoding ANSI .txt files into Windows format bitmaps. It was created to simplify sharing private messages (eg. via facebook) written into inconspicuous pictures. Encode a message -> Post picture online -> Share link -> Recipient downloads picture & decodes message. It also features an extra Vigenere-type algorithm allowing simple password-based encryption of text files.
summary: Txt2Bmp encodes a text file into bitmap without its visible change
